remarks: Subtracting both sides of two 'less than or equal to' relations. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
leidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltnegd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltadd1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
lt2addd.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
le2addd.5 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ C ) $.
le2addd.6 $e |- ( ph -> B <_ D ) $.
le2subd $p |- ( ph -> ( A - D ) <_ ( C - B ) ) $.
